My problem, from what I can tell right now, is that the plug-in=
 from

d
look for tests there too.

I guess we could use the DirectorySuiteBuilder=

and put a class at

com.company.package and
itest=
.com.company.package

in every eclipse project/mvn module. That would be 16=
 files ... Perhaps
looking into the Eclipse plug-in isn't such a bad idea (=
